column4: can anyone help me adjust the settings for folding@home?..it runs all the time and i'm afraid of killing my puter
it seems to run constantly and I'm afraid it's going to kill my processor or something
that's how it works.. if you don't like having a program that uses 100% of your 'spare processing power' why did you install one?
es. exactly. That's what happens when you're constantly using 100% of available processing power
